data.richContent:
Tentang kami

QBL Media Pty Ltd (ABN: 73 602 663 141), yang beroperasi dengan nama VideoTranslator, adalah perusahaan teknologi media yang berbasis di Sydney, Australia.

Kami menawarkan solusi AI berbasis SaaS yang mempermudah telekonferensi multibahasa dan terjemahan teks, membantu klien meningkatkan komunikasi global dan memaksimalkan ROI (Return on Investment) dari interaksi internasional mereka. Kami berfokus pada penyediaan komunikasi yang lancar dan real-time di berbagai bahasa dan wilayah.

Saat ini, layanan kami mencakup lebih dari 120 bahasa, 150 dialek, dan 150 suara sintetis berbeda, memastikan interaksi global yang efektif dan dinamis untuk semua kebutuhan komunikasi Anda.

Mengapa Kami Ada

Percakapan awal antara sang pendiri, Tat Banerjee, dan beberapa dokter di India menginspirasi pencetusan VideoTranslatorAI pada tahun 2017.

Besar di India, Tat Banerjee tidaklah asing dengan istilah multibahasa. Namun, di negara dengan 22 bahasa resmi, kesetaraan akses informasi bisa menjadi tantangan. Ketika bercakap dengan para dokter di India, dia menemukan bahwa kesalahan penerjemahan yang sedikit saja bisa berakibat fatal. Misalnya, karena terjemahan yang salah, obat yang diresepkan tidak akurat sehingga menghasilkan efek samping yang seringkali fatal bagi pasien.

Dengan begitu banyak bahasa resmi dan ribuan dialek daerah di India, multibahasa merupakan tantangan bagi sistem perawatan kesehatan.

Untuk menjembatani masalah ini, lahirlah ide VideoTranslatorAI.

Misi Kami

Di era global saat ini, kami menyadari bahwa komunikasi lintas bahasa yang efektif merupakan tantangan besar bagi bisnis dari berbagai skala, lembaga pemerintah, maupun individu.

Solusi berbasis AI kami dirancang untuk memperlancar telekonferensi multibahasa dan terjemahan teks, membuat kolaborasi internasional dan komunikasi pribadi menjadi lebih mudah.

Misi kami adalah untuk mempermudah interaksi dengan menyediakan alat canggih yang memastikan komunikasi yang jelas dan efisien dalam berbagai bahasa untuk semua orang.

Tim Kami

VideoTranslatorAI terdiri dari tim desainer, pengembang, penguji, dan pemasar di seluruh dunia. Untuk menciptakan produk yang lebih kuat dan ramah pengguna, kami terus berupaya melakukan peningkatan.

Layanan kami

Penerjemahan Teks

Layanan terjemahan teks kami memberikan terjemahan yang tepat dan akurat sesuai konteks di semua bahasa utama dan turunannya. Dengan memanfaatkan fitur kamus khusus, kami meningkatkan akurasi terjemahan dengan memasukkan kosakata dan terminologi yang relevan dengan konten Anda. Baik untuk kebutuhan bisnis atau pribadi, AI canggih kami memastikan pesan Anda tersampaikan dengan jelas dan efektif dalam bahasa apa pun.

Telekonferensi Multibahasa

Alat telekonferensi multibahasa kami mengubah cara komunikasi global dengan menghasilkan transkripsi otomatis dari percakapan Anda, yang kemudian diterjemahkan ke dalam bahasa yang dipilih. Dukungan fitur kamus dan glosarium khusus akan meningkatkan akurasi transkrip dan terjemahan secara signifikan, memastikan penggunaan istilah khusus industri dan kejelasan konteks yang tepat. Pendekatan inovatif ini memudahkan komunikasi dua arah antara individu dari latar belakang bahasa yang berbeda, memudahkan dan meningkatkan efektivitas kolaborasi dan pertemuan internasional.

Ikuti kami di media sosial:

Facebook

X

LinkedIn

YouTube

About Us

QBL Media Pty Ltd (ABN: 73 602 663 141) trading as VideoTranslator, is a media-technology company based in Sydney, Australia.

We offer SaaS-based AI solutions that streamline multilingual teleconferencing and text translation, empowering clients to enhance global communication and maximise ROI on their international interactions. We focus on providing seamless, real-time communication across diverse languages and regions.

Currently, we support 120+ languages, 150+ dialects, and 150 distinct voices, ensuring effective and dynamic global interactions for all your communication needs.

Our Why

An initial conversation between the founder, Tat Banerjee, and Indian doctors led to the creation of VideoTranslator in 2017.

Growing up in India, Tat is no stranger to multilingualism. In a country with 22 official languages, equal access to information is a challenge.

Speaking with doctors, a significant challenge was that simple mistranslations would often result in the wrong medication being prescribed, with adverse and sometimes fatal side effects for patients.

Multilingualism is challenging for the healthcare system with so many official languages and thousands of regional dialects in India. This challenge is present in healthcare, and other services sectors, worldwide.

To bridge this gap, which we think of as the 'communication at scale' challenge, the idea of VideoTranslator was born.

Our Mission

We recognise that effective multilingual communication is a critical challenge for businesses of all sizes, government agencies, and individuals in today’s global landscape.

Our AI-powered solutions are designed to simplify and enhance multilingual teleconferencing and text translation, making international collaboration and personal communication effortless.

Our mission is to transform interaction by providing advanced tools that ensure clear and efficient communication across diverse languages for everyone.

Our Team

VideoTranslator's team comprises designers, developers, testers, and marketers worldwide. To create even more powerful and user-friendly products, we are constantly striving for improvement.

Mel Taylor (Advisor)

As an Honorary Associate Professor at Macquarie University (MQU) and an Adjunct Research Fellow at Western Sydney University (WSU), Mel Taylor’s academic career has focused on emergency communications.

From natural hazards-related communications, where she has worked with the NSW SES (State Emergency Services), the ABC, and Infrastructure Australia, among others, to the assessment of biosecurity threats, where she has previously worked with both the Australian and British Defence establishments, her expertise brings significant academic rigour to VideoTranslator’s enterprise offerings for clients.

Kiwako Ito (Advisor)

An Associate Professor of Linguistics, Kiwako Ito leads the Masters of Translation Studies program at the University of Newcastle (UoN).

As the Director of the Lab for Applied Language Science at UoN, her academic research focused on digital engagement in English as a Second Language (ESL) and Culturally and Linguistically Diverse (CaLD) communities.

She advises VideoTranslator on evaluating quality in translation of text and speech forms and on the comprehension and decision-making processes of ESL speakers when presented with translated messages in different modalities.

Brian Lim (Advisor)

A well-regarded entrepreneur, educator and community builder, Brian has been in and around the startup scene for 15+ years. 

A technologist by training, he has published several papers in IEEE journals, primarily around distributed networks of sensor applications and wireless networking.

He has also founded or co-founded several organisations in the space sector, his previous effort HyperCubes raised $5m for a network of hyperspectral satellites and is currently the CEO of Dandelions - a small sat and aerospace consultancy looking at its first launch in late 2023.

Brian advises VideoTranslator on the business side, looking at opportunities in space, defense (HADR - Humanitarian Aid and Disaster Relief) and the non-profit sector.

Tat Banerjee (CEO)

Tat was educated at the Australian National University (ANU) in Canberra and graduated with a double Bachelor of Engineering Honours (Systems) and Bachelor of IT (Information Systems) degrees. 

Tat then spent the next several years in platform and liquidity sales to real-money and fast-money clients at State Street Global Markets (SSGM/SSGX), an American investment bank, primarily in the currencies and commodities (FICC) markets.

During this period, he attained a Masters in Applied Finance from the Macquarie Graduate School of Management (MAFC/MGSM) at Macquarie University (MQU) in Sydney.

He left the markets in 2016 to work on an aerospace startup, leading sales and IT, and started working on VideoTranslator full-time in 2019.

Our Services

Text Translation

Our text translation service provides precise and contextually accurate translations across all major languages and their derivatives. Leveraging customised dictionaries, we enhance translation accuracy by incorporating specialised vocabulary and terminology relevant to your content. Whether for business or personal use, our advanced AI ensures that your message is conveyed clearly and effectively in any language.

Multilingual Teleconferencing

Our multilingual teleconferencing tool revolutionises global communication by generating auto-transcriptions of conversations, which are then translated into selected languages. With the support of our customised dictionary and glossary tools, transcription and translation accuracy is significantly improved, ensuring the correct use of industry-specific terms and contextual clarity. This innovation allows for seamless two-way communication between individuals with different language backgrounds, making international meetings and collaborations smoother and more effective.
